coded_answer.p: I have just received your letter. It was very sorrysad news toabout Richard Brown. I have given mucha lot of information ofabout the international student conference.

Firstly, the conference will take place in the Palace Hotel and we get from our college to there by bus. Number 45 bus runsgoes to there every 5 minutes. It takes 25 minutes, thatwhich is convenient tofor us. Secondly, there are some items on the programme that are very great. First timeFirst of all, the conference's head makemakes a short speech and then we have dinner and drinks. Finally we enjoy a disco party so you should wear a suiteablesuitable dress.
On the last day I will go to your house and then we think about our's conference plane.
I hope it will be a successful conference.

Alice knew that it was going to be a very special day for her. Alice and Jane came back her home. Alice is Jane's boy friendboyfriend. In the morning they have met and then they went to the beach. It was nice weather and they had a beautiful time. In the evening they were going to the disco party that was Jane's friend's birthday party.

Jane suddenly thought about her house key that she had left inside her house and Alice could see the her house and he found the bathroom window was openingopen. So he crimbedclimbed on the radderladder up to the window and he opened the door but policemen came there "what happened?"

Jane expainedexplained that situationssituation and they under stoodunderstood himher. So they could go to the disco party. It was a very wonderful party and they have never forgotforgotten that day. It was a very very special day.
